channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.description: The White House Correspondents' Association says it is "unequivocally opposed" to a new White House policy limiting what rooms reporters can access.

item.title: Trump reveals first photos after Lincoln Bedroom's renovation in the White House
